Title: The Bank Job
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Carol Kolb, David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor), Carly Hallam (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake and Rosa learns there's more to Lieutenant Hawkins' team than meets the eye as they continue searching for bank robbers.
